title: Enchanting Emerald & Diamond Haaramm: "Harita Sobha" (Green Radiance)
materials: GH Color Diamonds (VS Clarity). Features a high Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: A stunning two-layered Haaram, featuring meticulously set emeralds, each framed by shimmering diamonds. The design incorporates a central emerald pendant embraced by diamond floral motifs. Delicate diamond droplets add a touch of ethereal charm. Classic design reflecting royal influences.
colors: and Rich Yellow Gold create a harmonious and luxurious palette.
occasions: and other grand celebrations like Seemantham
or any special occasion where you wish to make a statement of elegance. A heritage piece ideal for brides during their Muhurtham.
description: This Haaram is an heirloom piece, showcasing exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The rare emeralds, combined with brilliant diamonds and 22K gold, signify prosperity and good fortune. It's a harmonious blend of traditional aesthetics and contemporary appeal, a treasure to cherish for generations.
